name: Chillin' Outback (Skill Card)
text:
Chumley / Skill
At the start of the Duel, flip this card over.
Once per turn, you can change 1 face-up "Koala" or "Kangaroo" monster's battle position. "Koala" and "Kangaroo" monsters you control can attack while in face-up Defense Position. If they do, apply their DEF for damage calculation.
